version_description:
Bug fixes
Push news removal

This latest update fixes the issue with refrigerants that went missing.
Danfoss has upgraded the Refrigerant Slider with more information per refrigerant like recommended lubricant, safety group, chemical name, composition, colour code of containers et
Minor feature updates.
Minor adjustments

What’s new in version 3.1.2

Fix of minor issues with absolute and gauge pressures
Easier switch between absolute and gauge pressures
Added a few refrigerants
New look and feel
Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Additional refrigerants added, fixes of minor bugs

- GWP calculation method in accordance with IPCC AR5
- Minor changes in a few refrigerant properties
New added refrigerants, Tips and tricks for high altitude measurements.

- CO2 Transcritical P-T values added
- New refrigerants added
- You can now switch between the GWP values according to IPCC AR4 or AR5 for work with the European F-Gas regulations

Corrections to P-T calculations
Removal of pop-up screen

- Improved refrigerant selection experience
- Improved input of pressure and temperature values
- Added R600a, R601, and R601a to refrigerant list

You're favorites are back! Many of you reached out with feedback about a feature that had been removed and we heard you loud and clear. With this update, that feature is back in the app. Let's keep the conversation going; please send your feedback and sug

•Look and feel has been updated
•Settings have been moved to floating icon in top right corner
•Language option is now available in app settings and not tied to default device language
•Slider is now responsive and scales according to scree

•General bug fixes
•Look and feel has been updated
•Settings have been moved to floating icon in top right corner
•Language option is now available in app settings and not tied to default device language
•Slider is now responsive and scale

- Added new refrigerant: R141b, R469A & R718 (water).
- Added input temperature and pressure range information.
- Overall performance & UI improvements.
- Bug fixes.
Our popular Low-GWP Tool and Troubleshooter apps are now part of Refrigerant Slider.

1. Additional tool - Spare Parts app included
2. New feature: Dark mode
3. Changes and bug fixes
Various improvements & bug fixes

- Podcasts
- Improvements and bug fixes

- Name and logo changed to Ref Tools
- Included the Danfoss Magnetic Tool in the Tools section
- Improvements and bug fixes

- Name and logo changed to Ref Tools
- Included the Danfoss Magnetic Tool in the Tools section
- Improvements and bug fixes

- Want to share your cool findings with your colleagues? Not a problem! Ref Tools now includes share functionality for several of the tools
- Sort your 'Recent' history so that you can easily filter out what you looked at last time you were at a given
